description: Hi! I would like to know male to have entertaining conversations and at the same time practice my English. I am Girl Peruvian and I speak Spanish, I like to laugh, I love to travel and learn new topics, go to the movies and enjoy life from many perspectives! so if you are interested in speaking by phone, skype or face to face (if you are in Lima-Perú) or maybe you want to travel to South America in a near future, contact me and leave a message!
intent: Fun, Friendship, Romance, Serious Relationship, Marriage
